channel.title: Looking for a team. (Friendly team)
channel.description:
Okay so i've bein working on A blank 317. 508 look a like [Only gameframe & bank is 508 nothing else. Also i got 12 quest's working and 1 custom quest. Most skills work. All stairs etc. But i want to make the server popular and make it famious after i made it perfect. Anyways, when its finnish i'll be putting up donations and Forum for my server. (i'll share with my team.) Heres some coding im pro at ; -Npc dialogue. -Making quest's. -Object & Npc spawning. -Welcome message. -Also this "+playerName+" For example Hello "I pk 4lyfe". "+playerName+" will say the name of the player. -And whole lot more cba to post all.
Post this about urself.
Age. Name. Coding experience.
Thank you all.
And it has fully leecher protecton, dont even bother trying it. aswell speaking of it, its an Ip system so if the team decide to leech then ill block ur Ip, dont need to speak more of that.

item.dc:creator: @pkerA pkerA
item.description:
@pkerA wrote:

[quote=“paypalftw, post:5, topic:338788”]Mark ; Dont post here then, you faggot. [that felt good]
London ; Would be great!
noob ftw or somthing ; Its only 508 Frame. witch is good basicly, it has clan chat, notes, music mp3, quest tab, and the other green quest tab will be filled with information and important stuff. Its only the frame and the bank wich is 508. ;-)[/quote]

I wanna be in the team… Man, i didnt epect more ppl to join since 508 frame!

Read full topic
